channel.title: Ip ban problem
channel.description: Sometimes, when i ip ban somebody on my server. it ip bans everybody in teh server aswell.... ny 1 know whats wrong? it doesnt immediately ip everybody, it does it like 2 mins after. and no 1 can log in.

item.title: Ip ban problem
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

sometimes wierd ass stuff like that happened to me… but it was more like it just logged me off and everyone else, and said they were already logged in. i had to reset the server… never botherd to figure that out. maybe its just your coding. get a new ip ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip ban problem
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

Check your ban file, does it say they are banned, or are you having that infamous port forwarding issue?

Read full topic
